sentences.en: A youngster developed in college the political craft.
sentences.cn: 青年人在大学里就学会了一套政治手腕.

sentences.en: Alertness, calmness, courage : he could see them all in the youngster's face.
sentences.cn: 机警, 镇定, 胆量,都摆出在这年青人的脸上.

sentences.en: As a youngster, Joe sometimes liked to be whirled by another boy until he was staggering.
sentences.cn: 乔在年青时代有时喜欢叫别的男孩拉着他转圈,直到他快要摔倒.

sentences.en: Barcelona risk missing out on AS Monaco youngster Serge Gakpe.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗纳正冒着失去摩纳哥的年轻球员塞尔吉·加克佩的危险.

sentences.en: Having an active youngster about the house can be quite wearing.
sentences.cn: 家里有个好动的小孩会是相当累人的。

sentences.en: I rode the youngster on my back.
I was only a youngster in 1935.
Other youngsters are not so lucky.
sentences.cn: 其他的年轻人没有这么幸运。

sentences.en: Ritchie a boisterous, likeable, well - built youngster, and he was a useful footballer.
sentences.cn: 里奇是个脾气火暴的, 可爱的, 体格健壮的年轻人, 也是个不错的球员.

sentences.en: That youngster works with a will.
sentences.cn: 这小伙子干活有股傻劲儿.

sentences.en: The two men had taught the youngster the love of the country.
sentences.cn: 他们俩教导孩子热爱这乡土.

sentences.en: The youngster got nine months' youth custody.
sentences.cn: 这个少年被处以9个月的管教。

sentences.en: The youngster has been excused by the law on the ground of his youth.
sentences.cn: 这个青年由于年轻而受到法律的赦免.

sentences.en: Warren was too weary to waste words with the youngster.
sentences.cn: 华伦很疲乏,不想跟这小伙子多费唇舌.

sentences.en: When a drug pusher offered the Los Angeles youngster $100 to peddle drugs, Jack refused.
sentences.cn: 一个毒贩给杰克100美元让他贩卖毒品时，这个洛杉矶少年拒绝了。

words.tran_cn: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
